content.title: Bridge Anticoagulation
content.description: Perioperative anticoagulation management for patients on warfarin

key_concepts.details: Consider for high-risk patients: mechanical valve, recent VTE, high CHADS2-VASc
No bridging non-inferior to bridging for AF; increased bleeding with bridging
Most AF patients do NOT need bridging; individualize based on thromboembolic risk
Stop warfarin 5 days pre-op; start LMWH when INR subtherapeutic; stop LMWH 24h pre-op

content.clinical_significance: Trend toward less bridging due to bleeding risk

primary_sources: Douketis JD et al. N Engl J Med 2015
